column4: HELP! just got a MyBook (usb drive) and can't mount it any way I try.
the damn thing is on FAT32 (if that's responsible for it?)
: i assume it doesnt show up under lsusb
: and google didn't return any help?
I wouldn't bother you guys if it did
: well after looking on the web, seems like other poeple are using theirs.. so it is possible.
thanks. I know it's possible. The question is, "how?"
when I unplugged my mouse, it changed, but when I plugged in the MyBook... nothing...
: if its not showing up in dmesg i dont know where to start
thanks for your support on this one. Bad usb port. Just plugged it in one of the ones in the front and it autodetected. (Thats what happens when you have 16 usb ports... :) )
: thats almost funny, i was thinking earlier that you might be using a usb 1.1 and needing a usb2 but it shoulda worked none the less
